character.title: Character
character.attention_message: All values will be reset to initial parameters.
character.spend_all_points: Spend all attribute points before saving.
character.distribute_all_skills: You must distribute all skill points.
character.select_exactly_skills: You must select exactly {count} main skills. Selected: {selected}
character.select_additional_skills: You must select {count} additional skills from trait. Selected: {selected}
character.distribute_attributes_first: Please distribute and save attributes first
character.not_enough_skill_points: You don't have enough skill points left.
character.too_many_tagged_skills: Tagging this skill would exceed the maximum rank ({maxRank}). Please reduce its value first.
character.change_origin: Change origin? All your attributes, skills and traits will be reset. Are you sure?
character.change_equipment: Warning! When selecting a new equipment kit, all current inventory will be reset. Continue?
character.equipment_will_be_reset: Inventory and all equipment will be reset. Continue?
character.no_equipment_for_origin: No equipment kits available for this origin.
character.trait_selected: Trait for this origin is already selected.
character.no_traits_for_origin: No available traits for this origin

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.item_not_weapon: This is not a weapon, fool. Only weapons can be equipped in weapon slots.
inventory.which_weapon_replace: Which weapon would you like to replace?
inventory.item_not_armor: This cannot be equipped, moron. Only armor and clothing can be equipped on body.
inventory.equipment_replacement: Equipped items will be removed to make space. Continue?
inventory.item_cannot_be_removed: This item cannot be removed because it couldn't be equipped.
inventory.not_chem: This is not a chem, turn your brain on.
inventory.apply_to_self_question: Do you want to apply {item} to yourself or another character?
inventory.not_weapon_for_modification: Only weapons can be modified, idiot.
